title.narrative: Rural Development: Agricultural Value Chains Promotion Project

description.narrative: The overall objective of PAPFA is to contribute to poverty reduction and stimulate economic growth in the regions of Boucle du Mouhoun, des Cascades et des Hauts- Bassins. The development objective is to sustainably improve the food security and incomes of farmers working in production and value addition in the rice, market gardening, sesame and cowpea value chains.

name.narrative: Rural Development: Agricultural Value Chains Promotion Project

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
